Argh! Sorry.

::Lavatron::

Lavatron sees Surgital fire at Tantrum to get him out of the way, and
then feels Tantrum hit his leg. He growls, the horns scratching his
armor pretty seriously. Lifting his leg, Lavatron stamps it down at
Tantrum.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Tantrum was stupid, but not incompetent. He had expected the kick
this
> time, and  leapt to the side, and between Lavatrons legs. He then
tried to
> gore his horns into Lavatrons leg that wasnt kicking outwards.
